financial_form.consent_text: I give my consent for my Financial Aid office to use any available financial aid funds that I have available to me for the purchase of the Vista Higher Learning product(s) specified on this page. Furthermore, I expressly allow my Financial Aid office to pay Vista Higher Learning directly from my available funds the final purchase price of the product(s). I understand that the final purchase price may differ from the price shown on this page to account for any required tax(es) due on the product(s).
